message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to present you with an opportunity to acquire our premium product, which I believe would greatly enhance your business operations. Given its value and the benefits it offers, we're considering an offer of $9,500 for you to consider. This price reflects the quality and potential impact of the product on your endeavors. We understand its significant worth to you stands at $10,000, and we aim to bridge this gap while ensuring both parties benefit. Please let us know if this offer meets your expectations or if you'd like to discuss further terms.
